com.conceptwave.scripting
Class Document

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject
          com.conceptwave.scripting.OrderItem
              com.conceptwave.scripting.Document
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasketCharge, DynamicDocumentBase
public class Document
extends OrderItem

Document class. Represent a flat collection of document leaf nodes.

Field Detail

dbSchema

public String dbSchema
READONLY: Get the database schema name for database mapped documents

dirty

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean dirty
READWRITE: Flag indicating that the document is new or has data that has not been saved. If set to false the document will not be stored in the database. If set to true the document will be stored only if it has been changed or the document is new

orderId

public String orderId
READONLY: Get the ID of the order containing this document. The document in memory may not be contained in an order memory object, but it still will return the order id if it is part of order

originalId

public String originalId
READONLY: The original identifier of the data object. return null if this document has no 'cwOriginalId' leaf or it has no System generated key.

parentDocument

public Document parentDocument
READONLY: Get the document containing a reference to this document. If this is not a document brought by a reference finder returns null.

Constructor Detail

Document

public Document(String metadataName,
                String docId,
                com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean optionalThrowException,
                com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean runLoadScript)
Creates a new document instance of the specified metadata type

Parameters:
metadataName - String The fully qualified metadata document name
docId - String Optional document id. If specified the document is read from the database
optionalThrowException - If not specified or true throws exception if the document with the specified id is not found in the database. If false and a document with the specified id does not exist in the database a new empty document is created and the document id is set to the specified value.
runLoadScript - if true or not specified the document load script will be executed
Method Detail

clearData

public void clearData()
Clears all fields of the document - sets null in them

copyDocument

public Document copyDocument(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean copyId,
                             com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean dontRunTriggers)
Creates a replica of the specified document. The document keys are copied only if the copyId parameter is true.

Parameters:
copyId - - if true the document ids are copied too
dontRunTriggers - If true does not run the triggers for the destination document by cleaning the flags
Returns:
The new document.

copyLOB

public void copyLOB(String fCol,
                    String tCol,
                    Document jDoc,
                    com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isNCLOB,
                    DatabaseConnection con)
Copy large object (LOB) in the database. If the document is new or has changes must be saved before calling this API.

Parameters:
fCol - Large object (LOB) source column name.
tCol - Large object (LOB) target column name.
jDoc - Document contains target LOB
isNCLOB - Specifies whether the source and target columns are NCLOB (true) or regular CLOB (false)
con - Optional parameter. If provided, transaction associated to the DatabaseConnection will be used to save this document.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if i/o error

copyToDocument

public void copyToDocument(Document docCopy,
                           com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean copyKeys,
                           com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean resetTargetTriggers)
Copy the content of the current document to the document given by the first' parameter. Depending on the value of the second parameter the document keys are or are not copied.

Parameters:
docCopy - Document to copy to. Should be the same type as the current document.
copyKeys - Boolean flag. If true the current document key(s) are copied too. If false a new key is generated if the document has system generated key or the key(s) are set to null otherwise.
resetTargetTriggers - Boolean flag. If true, the target document triggers are reset after copy.

cwOnDocInit

public void cwOnDocInit()
Metadata script that is automatically invoked after a new document instance is created. Metadata developers can initialize the document with default or calculated values. The default system action is to do nothing.

cwOnDocLoad

public void cwOnDocLoad()
Metadata script that is invoked automatically when an instance of a Document is created from a database record. Script is invoked after the documents fields are all populated. The default system action is to do nothing.

cwOnDocStore

public void cwOnDocStore()
Metadata script that is invoked automatically just before a document is stored in the database; eg. when "save()" is invoked or any other action on the document that forces it to be saved or updated. Note: if no changes exist in the document since the last save, then this method is not invoked. The default system action is to do nothing.

cwOnDocVisualKey

public String cwOnDocVisualKey()
Metadata script to return a label for this document to be used in the User Interface. The default system action is to return the metadata document label in the default language.

Returns:
String The metadata document label.

deleteFromDB

public void deleteFromDB(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean throwException,
                         DatabaseConnection con)
Deletes a document from the database. The document key fields have to be populated. If the document is part of an order internally calls the deleteItem API.

Parameters:
throwException - if true the delete operation throws exception if the document is not found in the database
con - Optional parameter. If provided, transaction associated to the DatabaseConnection will be used to save this document.

deleteItem

public void deleteItem()
Use this method only if the document is part of an order, else use deleteFromDb. Deletes this document from the database. The document key fields have to be populated. Throws exception if the document is not found in the database.

diffDocument

public Array diffDocument(Document target,
                          com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean formatted)
Compares two instances of the same metadata document and returns list of changes as array of triplets. First value leaf name (or label if formatted is true), second value is this document value and third value is second document value

Parameters:
target - The target document.
formatted - Specifies if to return formatted values suitable for display or actual data stored in the document
Returns:
The array of changes between two documents

docCopyScript

public void docCopyScript()
Metadata script that is automatically invoked by the "copyAction" script of the base User Interface Finder. Note, if the copyAction script of a User Interface Finder is overriden and the override script does not specifically invoke this method, this method will not be invoked in that case. Default system action is to do nothing.

formattedValueForLeaf

public static String formattedValueForLeaf(String documentType,
                                           String leafName,
                                           String value)
Returns formatted visual representation of a given value using the format specification of the specified document leaf. Throws exception if the leaf does not exist. Returns the original value if the format is not supported.

Parameters:
documentType - Fully qualified document type
leafName - Leaf name
value - Value to format
Returns:
Formatted value using the document leaf format

generateAndAttachPDF

public void generateAndAttachPDF(String xslfo,
                                 String xml)
Generates and attaches a PDF to a document. The system attachment document "cwf:attachmentDoc" or a document derived from it must be used to call function.

Parameters:
xslfo - XSL spec.
xml - XML to be transformed.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getAllAllowedStates

public Array getAllAllowedStates(String state,
                                 String lifeCycle)
Retrieves all possible transitions from the current state, according to the Life Cycle diagram. The current document is passed as a parameter to condition script of Life Cycle diagram link

Parameters:
state - Current state
lifeCycle - Life Cycle object that defines the state diagram
Returns:
Array of all possible transitions from the current state. The function returns null if state or lifeCyle are invalid or there are no valid transitions.

getAttachment

public FileReader getAttachment()
Returns a file reader which can be used to read the document's attachment. Returns null if the document has no attachment. Please Note, the calling document must be an instance of cwf.attachmentDoc or an extension of cwf.attachmentDoc.

getAttachmentUrl

public String getAttachmentUrl(String mimeType,
                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean checkContent)
Get the document attachment url

Parameters:
mimeType - - mime type
checkContent - If true, it checks if the attachment data is not empty
Returns:
url

getAttachments

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object[] getAttachments()
Returns a collection of cwf.attachmentDoc which is associate to the calling document. Returns null if the document has no attachment. Please Note, the calling document must be parent of attachment documentation. With the returned collection, user is able to retrive the attached file based on each attachDoc in the collection eg. var attachDoc1 = parent.addAttachment(); var attachDoc2 = parent.addAttachment(); var attachDocs = parent.getAttachments() FileReader fr = attachDocs[0].getAttachment(); // returned filereader is the file attached to attachDoc1

getCachedDBDocument

public static Document getCachedDBDocument(String type,
                                           com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer expirationIntervalInMin,
                                           com.conceptwave.scripting.Object[] keys)
Gets a document that is mapped to the database from the document cache. If the document is not found in the cache it is read from the database and stored in the document cache. The expiration time of the cached document is set according to the expirationIntervalInMin parameter.

Parameters:
type - A fully qualified metadata name of the document
expirationIntervalInMin - The expiration interval of the cached document in minutes. If the document has been in the cache more than the expiration interval it will be re-read from the database on a first a request and its expiration time will be set accordingly.
keys - The document id or several strings that are the parts of the compound document key (key consisting of several document leafs). If the value of the parameter is equal or less than 0 an expiration interval of 60 (one hour) is assumed.
Returns:
The document or null if the document is not found in the database. The returned document is immutable and any attempt to set a leaf value will throw exception.

getCodeTableSize

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer getCodeTableSize(String leafName)
Checks the code table size a given document leaf

Parameters:
leafName - String The document leaf name
Returns:
size for the leaf code table or 0 if leaf is not enumeration.

getDocumentAsList

public Array getDocumentAsList(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean formatted,
                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean references,
                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean dbOnly,
                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean changedOnly)
Returns document as array of leafs name and value pairs. Each element of the pair is separate array element.

Parameters:
formatted - If this parameter value is true the name element contains the leaf label and the value element contains leaf value formatted as it is displayed on the screen. If false the name element contains the leaf metadata name and the value element contains the leaf's raw string data as stored in the memory.
references - Optional flag. If true the value element reference and translation leafs will contain the corresponding reference visual key or translation leaf language translation. If false or not specified it will contain the corresponding reference key or translation key.
dbOnly - Optional flag. If true the leaves not mapped to the database are not put in the returned array. If false or not specified all leaves are put in the array.
changedOnly - Optional flag. If true, only the leaves that changed are put in the returned array
Returns:
Array of names/value pairs for the document leaves.

getFieldLabel

public String getFieldLabel(String overlayName,
                            String elementName)
This API is primarily used to support older metadata where there is logic dependant on the name of the UI element. Please avoid using this API in 5.x.

Parameters:
overlayName - Name of the Overlay which contains the element
elementName - Name of the UI element
Returns:
The translated label of the element

getFromCache

public static Document getFromCache(String docId,
                                    String finderType,
                                    String docType)
Retrieve document from the document cache. If the document is not in the cache it is read from the database (if it is mapped to the database) or retrieved by the specified finder if it is not mapped to the database.

Parameters:
docId - Document ID. If null the result will be null.
finderType - Optional fully qualified metadata finder name that is used to define the document volatility and to obtain the document if it is not in mapped to database. If not specified or is null the document type will be taken from the docType parameter and standard expiration period of 10 min will be used.
docType - Optional parameter - fully qualified metadata document name of the result document. If the parameter is not specified or is null the document and the finderType parameter is null the method will return null. If specified and the finderType parameter is null the metadata document should be mapped to DB. If specified the docType takes precedence over the finderType as long as the document type is concerned.
Returns:
The document or null if the document cannot be found. The returned document is immutable and any attempt to set a leaf value will throw exception.
Throws:
Run - -time exception if the metadataFinder parameter is not null and does not specify a metadata finder or docType parameter is not null and does not specify a metadata document.

getItemsFromBLOB

public Array getItemsFromBLOB(String col,
                              String param,
                              com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isNCLOB)
Read XML data from NCLOB/CLOB/BLOB column in database and convert to list of data objects (documents, orders, or data structures).

Parameters:
col - Column name of NCLOB/CLOB/BLOB.
param - Can be a fully specified document type, namespace or null. If the parameter is fully qualified metadata document name the input XML is scanned for the instances of that document type and array of documents are returned. If the parameter is namespace name the top level element of the XML is considered to be order, data structure or document of this namespace. If such metadata element exists it is converted to data object and an array of one element is returned. If no metadata element matches the top level XML element null is returned. If the parameter is null then the xmlns element of the XML is used to find the corresponding metadata namespace. If found the result is the same as if the namespace name is specified. If no matching namespace is found or xmlns element is not specified null is returned.
isNCLOB - true if column is NCLOB, false if column is either CLOB or BLOB.
Returns:
Array of data objects or null.

getLeafLabel

public String getLeafLabel(String leafName)
Get leaf label for the specified leaf from this document.

Parameters:
leafName - Document leaf name
Returns:
The leaf label localized for the current user language or null if the leaf is not found in the document.

getLeafNames

public Array getLeafNames(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean sysFields,
                          com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean includeDynamicLeaves)
Returns an array of all leaf names in the document.

Parameters:
sysFields - Specifies if to return document leafs that are system fields, default true
includeDynamicLeaves - Whether to return the dynamic leaf names. If omitted, only returns the static leaf names
Returns:
Array of leaf names.

getTextDocuments

public static Array getTextDocuments(String text,
                                     String docName,
                                     com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer num,
                                     com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean fixed)
Extracts one or more documents from the specified text string. The conversion is done accordingly to the metadata text map. If text map is not specified for the given metadata document type CSV format is assumed if the fixed parameter is false or fixed record format if true.

Parameters:
text - The string containing the document. May contain more than one document.
docName - Fully qualified metadata document name. Throws exception if the name does not exist or is not a document type.
num - Maximum number of documents processed. If 0 all records from the text string are processed.
fixed - The format of the text record if not specified in the metadata.
Returns:
Array of documents or null if the text record is empty.

this document

                                                      String lifeCycle)

mapDocToDoc

public void mapDocToDoc(Document target,
                        String name,
                        com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean dontRunTriggers,
                        com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean changedOnly,
                        com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean throwException)
Deprecated. to be removed in 5.2. Use mapTo().

Maps the current document to the document specified as target parameter, using the specified conversion map. If no conversion map is specified the API will use the default conversion map.

Parameters:
target - The target document.
name - The full conversion map name or tag. If null the default conversion map will be used or error message will be issued
dontRunTriggers - If true the target document triggers are not run
changedOnly - optional flag. If true, only the leaves that changed are mapped
throwException - If true throws exceptions if the conversion map/default conversion map does not exist.

mapDocToStructure

public DataStructure mapDocToStructure(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object ds,
                                       String name,
                                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean throwException)
Deprecated. to be removed in 5.2. Use mapTo().

Maps the current document to the data structure specified as parameter using the specified mapping. If the no conversion map is found that satisfies the requirements, no mapping is done.

Parameters:
ds - The target data structure object or or target data structure metadata name.
name - The conversion map name or tag. If null the default conversion map will be used.
throwException - If true throws exceptions if the conversion map/default conversion map does not exist.
Returns:
The data structure

putInCache

public static void putInCache(Document doc,
                              String metadataFinder)
Puts an immutable replica of the document into the document cache. An attempt to change a leaf value of the cached document will generate exception.

Parameters:
doc - The original document. A replica of this document will be stored in the cache.
metadataFinder - Fully qualified metadata finder name that is used to define the document volatility. If the finder is not found the cached document never exepires.

read

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean read(String[] id)
Reads the document from the database.

Parameters:
id - Document ID. If null the ID/keys are already set into the document object. The ID can be a string or array of strings for foreign documents with more than one key. Throws error if the number of strings does not match the number of document keys.
Returns:
boolean False if the document is not found in the database.

readDoc

public static Document readDoc(String mdType,
                               String[] id)
Reads a document from the database.

Parameters:
mdType - Fully qualified metadata document name.
id - Document id. The id can be a string or array of strings for documents with more than one key. Throws error if the number of strings does not match the number of document keys.
Returns:
Document or null if the document is not found in the database or the id is null.
Throws:
Run - -time error if the document metadata name name does not exist or is not a metadata document or the number of strings for the document id parameter does not match the number of document keys.

readLOB

public String readLOB(String col,
                      com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean binary,
                      com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isNCLOB)
Read large object (LOB) from the database.

Parameters:
col - Column name of large object (LOB).
binary - Returns data as hexadecimal encoded string where every two characters represent one binary byte
isNCLOB - true if column is NCLOB, false if column is either CLOB or BLOB.
Returns:
Large object data.

                                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isNCLOB)
Read large object (LOB) into CwfScriptFileReader from the database.

Parameters:
col - Column name of large object (LOB).
isNCLOB - true if column is NCLOB, false if column is either CLOB or BLOB.
Returns:
CwfScriptFileReader which has Large object data.

reference

public ReferenceValue reference(String finderName)
Gets reference to the current document.

Parameters:
finderName - Optional fully qualified finder name. The reference expiration interval is set according to the finder volatility. If the finder is not specified the reference expiration interval is set to the default of 90 min.
Returns:
Reference to the current document.

                                 String mapName)
Runs the base conversion map script. If no base conversion map is found or it does not contain script does not do anything.

Parameters:
target - The conversion target object. Could be document or data structure.
mapName - The conversion map name

runTriggers

public void runTriggers()
Run document trigger scripts.

Overrides:
runTriggers in class CwObject

save

public void save(DatabaseConnection con)
Saves the document if it has changes. If the method is called from a business process script and update operation is needed only the fields that has been changed are stored in the database. Otherwise all document fields are stored.

Parameters:
con - Optional parameter. If provided, transaction associated to the DatabaseConnection will be used to save this document.

searchByFieldContent

public static DataObjectList searchByFieldContent(String docType,
                                                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Object[] params,
                                                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer nmax,
                                                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean operators)
Selects documents from the database by field content

Parameters:
docType - String - fully qualified metadata document name
params - Object - Array of search values. Every pair of array elements contains field name and field value
nmax - Optional int - maximum number of documents to be selected. if no value passed, the API uses value 1.
operators - boolean - if true, params array contains 3 values for each serach condition. Third value provides operator, for example: "in('A','B')" or "not null" or "> ?". when null, default operator "=?" will be used.
Returns:
CwfJsDataObjectList - result lists of document or null if nothing is selected

                                  String text,
                                  String language)
Sets the translation text in the specified language

Overrides:
setTranslation in class CwObject
Parameters:
fieldName - The name of the document field for which the translation will be set
text - String The translation text in the specified language. If null the method will do nothing and return null.
language - Object The language code. If not specified the current user language is used
Returns:
The translation object
Throws:
CwfException - if no such leaf in the document

Returns the data contained in the document in CSV format.

null.
Throws:

toDocFixed

public static Document toDocFixed(String text,
                                  String docName)
Extracts one document from the specified text record. The conversion is done accordingly to the metadata text map. If text map is not specified for the given metadata document, data type fixed field format is assumed. the text record should not contain any separator, and their lengths should exactly match the datatypes' length.

Parameters:
text - The text record.
docName - Fully qualified metadata document name. Throws exception if the name does not exist or is not a document type.
Returns:
Document or null if the text record is empty.

toText

public String toText()
Converts this document to a text record as specified in the metadata. If text mapping is not specified the document is converted to CSV (Comma Separated Values) format. The CSV separator character is as defined in the metadata; comma by default. Field values are not quoted except in the following cases where they are quoted with the metadata defined quote character or double quotes (") by default: 1) The value contains the separator character. 2) The value contains the newline character (\n). The result is terminated by the terminator character defined in the metadata or newline ('\n') by default. Notes: this method could be overridden by its cwToText script method.

Overrides:
toText in class CwObject
Returns:
The text record of the document.

toTextEx

public String toTextEx(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean putStringsInquotes)
Converts this document to a text record as specified in the metadata. If text mapping is not specified the document is converted to CSV (Comma Separated Values) format. The CSV separator character is as defined in the metadata; comma by default. The result is terminated by the terminator character defined in the metadata or newline ('\n') by default.

Parameters:
putStringsInquotes - If true all string data is quoted using the quote character specified in metadata. The default quote character is '"'. If false, string data may still be quoted in these cases: 1) The value contains the separator character. 2) The value contains the newline character (\n).
Returns:
The text record of the document.

toTextFixed

public String toTextFixed()
Converts the specified to text record as specified in the metadata. If text mapping is not specified the document is converted to fixed text format. Field values are not quoted except in the following cases where they are quoted with the metadata defined quote character or double quotes (") by default: 1) The value contains the separator character. 2) The value contains the newline character (\n). The result is NOT terminated by any character.

Returns:
The text record of the document.

trimToSize

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean trimToSize(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean logExceptions)
Trim the document string leaf values to the corresponding size

Parameters:
logExceptions - If true writes a message in the event log for each trimmed value.
Returns:
True if at least one value is trimmed.

writeLOB

public void writeLOB(String col,
                     com.conceptwave.scripting.Object lob,
                     com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isNCLOB,
                     DatabaseConnection con)
Write large object (LOB) to the database. If the document is new or has changes must be saved before calling this API.

Parameters:
col - Large object (LOB) column name.
lob - Large object data to write. Can be FileReader or any object that provides toString method
isNCLOB - true if column is NCLOB, false if column is either CLOB or BLOB.
con - Optional parameter. If provided, transaction associated to the DatabaseConnection will be used to save this document.

                                 String xml,
                                 String xslfo,
                                 com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isNCLOB)
Write result of XSLT transformation to the database. If the document is new or has changes must be saved before calling this API.

Parameters:
col - Large object (LOB) column name.
xml - to be transformed.
xslinfo - XSL transform.
isNCLOB - true if column is NCLOB, false if column is either CLOB or BLOB.
